wizard.intro: Blast off ðŸš€ with factor.io.kr! Access your full OctoPrint portal, printer controls, camera streams, and plugins from anywhere! FACTOR works on your desktop, laptop, tablet, phone, and your favorite OctoPrint apps!
wizard.tagline: FACTOR is free, secure, and super easy to setup!

help.link: Need help or want to send feedback?

setup.title: FACTOR Device Setup
setup.description: Click the button below to complete device setup on the FACTOR web dashboard.

help.title: How to Setup
help.step1: Click "Open Setup Page" button to start setup
help.step2: Login to your FACTOR account on the web page
help.step3: Complete the device registration and configuration
help.step4: Return here to verify the connection status
